entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
